Package com.google.appinventor.server

Interface Summary
FileExporter Methods for exporting project files.
FileImporter Methods for importing project files.
 

Class Summary
AndroidServlet Servlet for creating a page for downloading project output on an Android device.
CrashReport  
DownloadServlet Servlet for downloading project source and output files.
FileExporterImpl Implementation of FileExporter based on StorageIo
FileImporterImpl Implementation of FileImporter based on StorageIo
GetMotdServiceImpl Implementation of the get motd service.
HelpServiceImpl Implementation of the help service.
LaunchServiceImpl The implementation of the Launch RPC service which runs on the server.
LocalUser A singleton providing the UserInfoProvider interface information.
LogoutServlet Logout handler
OdeAuthFilter An authentication filter that uses Google Accounts for logged-in users.
OdeRedirectServlet Redirects requests to either the ODE main page or, if requested from an Android device, to the executable download page.
OdeRemoteServiceServlet Class supporting ODE GWT RPC, which ODE RPC implementations should subclass instead of HttpServlet
OdeServlet Class supporting ODE servlets, which ODE servlets should subclass instead of HttpServlet.
ProjectServiceImpl The implementation of the RPC service which runs on the server.
ReceiveBuildServlet Servlet for receiving build output files and build error information from a Build Server.
Server TODO(user); Useful server-related methods.
TosServlet Servlet to deal with displaying the Terms of Service and making sure that is displayed just once for any user TODO(user): do we still need this capability?
UploadServlet Servlet for uploading files.
UserInfoServiceImpl Implementation of the user information service.
WebStartFileServlet Servlet for downloading files for a WebStart enabled application.
WebStartJnlpServlet Servlet for downloading jnlp files, which are used to launch WebStart enabled applications.
Whitelist Implementation of a whitelist.
 

Exception Summary
FileImporterException Thrown by FileImporter methods.
